s.text: One method for assessing the sensitivity of microarray assays is to use exogenous spiking controls.
One method for assessing the sensitivity of microarray assays is to use exogenous spiking controls.
One method for assessing the sensitivity of microarray assays is to use exogenous spiking controls.

Each of the 10 plasmids was used to synthesize cRNA in vitro . cRNAs were quantitated and differentially spiked into heart and brain RNA samples at specific copy numbers based on the following assumptions: 360,000 mRNA transcripts per cell, 20 pg total RNA per cell and 1 pg mRNA transcript per cell; hence, 100 'spike' copies/cell would be equivalent to about 0.14 ng 'spike' transcript in 10 ?g total RNA [ 12].
One method for assessing the sensitivity of microarray assays is to use exogenous spiking controls.
Our results show that unmodified oligonucleotides can provide an accurate, reproducible and cost-effective means to measure gene-expression profiles.
Different hybridization and wash conditions were tested (data not shown).

Arabidopsis probe elements serve as excellent negative controls when exogenous cRNA is not added to the labeling reaction.
We chose a random primer labeling scheme so that oligonucleotide probe design would not be restricted to any particular region of the mRNA molecule.
Regardless of this, this particular probe was still able to distinguish differential expression of the H +-ATPase gene in heart and brain tissue.
The sequences of the 70-mers and corresponding GenBank accession numbers of the genes are available as an additional data file.

We postulate that a large fraction of H +-ATPase-specfic Cy-labeled targets (which on average should be 100-200 nucleotides long) were available for hybridization to complementary sequences found on the longer PCR amplicon probe but absent on the shorter 70-mer probe (for example, sequences downstream of the 70-mer).
Studies comparing long oligonucleotides to cDNA arrays have not been as forthcoming.

Lastly, our findings have broader implications, suggesting that the combination of expression measurements across different platforms (for example, Affymetrix and cDNA arrays, unmodified long oligonucleotides and cDNA arrays) within a single analysis maybe feasible [ 18].

Lastly, our findings have broader implications, suggesting that the combination of expression measurements across different platforms (for example, Affymetrix and cDNA arrays, unmodified long oligonucleotides and cDNA arrays) within a single analysis maybe feasible [ 18].

To mimic the Affymetrix design of freely moving probes tethered at one end onto a solid support, in-house manufactured or commercially available long oligonucleotides are modified by the addition of a 5' amino group for covalent attachment onto pre-activated glass slides [ 5, 10].

Oligonucleotides were synthesized at a 50 nmol scale by Invitrogen/Life Technologies (Carlsbad, CA) or Operon Technologies (Alameda, CA), and resuspended in sterile milliQ water to a final concentration of 100 ?M.
Primers were synthesized by Invitrogen/Life Technologies or Operon Technologies and purified by PAGE.
